data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the 37th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company will be held on Friday September 26 2025 at 3:00 p.m. through Video Conferencing / Other Audio Visual Means in accordance with the applicable Circulars issued by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) and the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI).

Pursuant to Regulation 34(1) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations) we are submitting herewith the Annual Report of the Company along with the Notice of 37th AGM for the financial year 2024-25 which is being sent through electronic mode to the Members.

The Annual Report containing the Notice of 37th AGM is also uploaded on the Companys website and can be accessed at https://mangroup.com/reports-2/

data.caption: Intimation Of 37Th Annual General Meeting And Book Closure Date.
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that 37th Annual General Meeting of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday September 26 2025 at 3:00 p.m. through Videoconferencing ("VC") and Other Audio Visual ("OAVM") means.

Further the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books shall remain closed from Friday September 19 2025 to Friday September 26 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of AGM.

data.news_body: We hereby inform you that Allotment Committee of Board of Directors of the Company in its Meeting held on Wednesday May 28 2025 approved the allotment of 2500000 Equity Shares to Man Finance Private Limited upon conversion of Warrants allotted to them by the Board of Directors on December 1 2023.

data.news_body: We hereby inform you that Investor/Analyst meeting of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday 30th May 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Reconsideration Of The Proposal For Raising Of Funds.
data.news_body: Man Industries (India) Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the raising of funds by way of issue of one or more instruments including Equity Shares Convertible or Non-Convertible Securities of any description or Warrants or Debt Securities through Preferential Issue Private Placements Rights Issue Qualified Institutional Placement (QIP) or any other methods or combination thereof as may be permitted under applicable laws subject to such regulatory/statutory approvals as may be required including the approval of the shareholders of the Company.

data.caption: Additional Details Required For Announcement Filed Under SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: With reference to the announcement filed by us on 12.05.2025 in respect of resignation of Mrs. Heena Vinay Kalantri Non-Executive Director of the Company we are furnishing herewith the additional details as required by you under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Results-Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their Meeting held on Thursday, May 18, 2023, has duly approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023, the Statement of Assets and Liabilities as at March 31, 2023, the Statement of Cash Flow as at March 31, 2023 and the Independent Auditors' Report with modified opinion on Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended on March 31, 2023. The copy of the same is enclosed herewith.

The Board meeting commenced at 12:15 P.M. and concluded at 03:15 P.M.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. Thursday, February 09, 2023 at 04.15 p.m. and the Board has inter-alia approved the following:

1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:

a. Statement showing the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.
b. Statement showing the Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.
c. Limited Review Report of our Auditors, M/s A. Sachdev & Co., Chartered Accountants in respect of the said financial results.

2. Mr. Rahul Rawat (ACS: 27891) has been appointed as Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the company w.e.f. 14th February, 2023 pursuant to Section 203 of the Companies Act 2013 and Regulation 6(1) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The aforesaid meeting was concluded at 06:00 P.M.

data.news_body:

The aforesaid meeting was concluded at 06:00 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 30 And 33 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body:
The outcome of the said meeting is as given hereunder:
1. Approval of Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022:
The Board of Directors have considered and approved the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the Quarter & year ended 31st March, 2022.
2. Audit Report for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022: The Board considered and approved the Independent Audit Report, on the Standalone & Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company, by M/s M.H. Dalal & Associates, Chartered Accountants Statutory Auditors of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.
3. Statements on Impact of Audit Qualification for Audit Report with Modified Opinion: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the Listing Regulations, 2015, Statements on Impact of Audit Qualification (Standalone & Consolidated) for Audit Report with Modified Opinion for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022, are enclosed
